Name: Adrenaline Maximum VI
Desc:
Pushes the limits of Adrenaline Boost by unlocking the power of combos and the full power of Maha. The extreme chill from Adrenaline Boost causes an ice storm to form periodically when she uses a direct Attack skill outside Adrenaline Boost.
Aran's pole arm skills, enhanced by Adrenaline Boost, release a deep, frigid chill that transforms into ice waves that attack nearby enemies faster, and after a certain number of hits, Aran enters Super Awakening, where she can unleash the full power of Maha.
While in Super Awakening, you can use the Hyper Boost End skill and Maha's power will turn into a golden flash of light, dealing additional Damage to enemies.
The duration of Adrenaline Boost is not affected by the duration of Super Awakening.
Super Awakening is not affected by Buff Duration Bonus effects.
Required Skill: Lv. 30 Adrenaline Maximum or higher

HFields.h1:
After reaching1000 combos, use Adrenaline Boost Activate to enter Adrenaline Boost mode for 15 sec.
Ice Storm: Attacks up to 12 enemies at 1560% Damage 14 times every 15 sec. when you use a direct Attack skill.
Ice Wave: Periodically attacks up to 7 enemies at 897% Damage 2 times.
10 or more successful attacks during Adrenaline Boost activates Super Awakening.
Super Awakening: Lasts for 5 sec. Enables Hyper Boost End. Direct attack skills activate Gold Flash every 0.8 sec.
Golden Flash: Attacks up to 12 enemies at 1190% Damage 10 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec. Super Awakening cooldown is indicated by the border of Adrenaline Boost Activate.
